text: Rudolf 'Rolf' Schafstall (22 February 1937 - 30 January 2018) was a German football coach and a player. He played for Hamborn 07 from 1950 to 1963 and for Reutlingen 05 from 1963 to 1969. He coached MSV Duisburg, VfL Bochum, and Bayer 05 Uerdingen. He was born in Duisburg, Germany. Schafstall died on 30 January 2018 in Krefeld, Germany at the age of 80.Rolf Schafstall ist tot ==References== Category:1937 births Category:2018 deaths Category:German footballers Category:German football managers Category:MSV Duisburg managers Category:VfL Osnabr√ºck managers Category:Sportspeople from Duisburg
